SEO_DESCRIPTION: Hire me as a software developer. I'm specialized in web application development.

HOME.PORTFOLIO_DESCRIPTION: As a software engineer, my specialization lies in web development. I am consistently seeking fresh challenges to further refine and enhance my skills.

ROCHE.TITLE: Software developer - Roche Diagnostics
ROCHE.DESCRIPTION: Collaborating within a team that operates under the SAFe framework and using React, I have contributed to the development of a software application aimed at monitoring and tracking cervical cancer in different countries, striving to make it a thing of the past.

APP2U.TITLE: Apprenticeship - App2u
APP2U.DESCRIPTION: At app2u, I had the opportunity to gain my first hands-on experience in the world of work, where I embarked on my journey of training in Angular.

ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION1: Since I was a child, I have always had a great passion for technology. In 2012, I decided to study software development, and the following year, I landed my first job in this field.
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION2: Along this journey, I have discovered that I love what I do, as web application development allows me to use my skills to design solutions that users can enjoy.
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION3: Part of my professional career has been as a Freelance Developer for various clients. I have a great knowledge of developing modular and scalable solutions that adapt to the needs and requirements of each project.
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION4: Thanks to this, I have had the opportunity to work with clients from all around the world, ranging from small to large enterprises.
